p: VEEV IAB strains were responsible for VEE epidemics and outbreaks from 1938 to 1973. Evidence suggested many VEE IAB outbreaks were related to immunization of animals with formalin-inactivated VEEV IAB vaccines containing residual live virus, as further VEE IAB outbreaks were not reported after discontinued use of the inactivated vaccines. However, continuous cryptic circulation as a source of epizootic emergence cannot be excluded [ 31].
